title: Good News: Chinese Scientists have Proven that Warmer Weather and High Relative Humidity Significantly Reduce Spread of COVID-19 - Novinite.com - Sofia News Agency
content: “High temperature and high relative humidity significantly reduce the transmission of COVID-19. ” An increase of just one degree Celsius and 1% relative humidity increase substantially lower the virus’s transmission, according to the data analyzed by the researchers.
warning: Based on the content, title, language and advertisements on this page, there is a risk that this page is not credible!
